caption.p: Effects of Tragia involucrata L. leaves extracts on acetic acid induced writhing. (A) Number of writhing, (B) percentage of inhibition. Data are shown as mean ± SEM. ∗ denotes p < 0.05 vs control, ∗∗ denotes p < 0.01 vs control, ∗∗∗ denotes p < 0.001 vs control (One-way ANOVA followed by Dunnett t-test).
